problem.markdown:
>>Glucose, which is made up of carbon, hydrogen and oxygen, would be considered a(n) _____ . << () element (x) molecule () neutron () proton () atom
[explanation]
Glucose is a molecule because it contains more than one atom. (Glucose is also a chemical compound because it contains more than two elements).
[explanation]
problem.p: Glucose, which is made up of carbon, hydrogen and oxygen, would be considered a(n) _____ .

choicegroup.label: Glucose, which is made up of carbon, hydrogen and oxygen, would be considered a(n) _____ .

div.p: Glucose is a molecule because it contains more than one atom. (Glucose is also a chemical compound because it contains more than two elements).
